TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Screen extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示單一系統上的顯示裝置或多重顯示裝置。

span.span: Represents a display device or multiple display devices on a single system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此物件的建構函式不是公用，因此您無法明確建立物件。The constructor for this object is not public, so you cannot explicitly create a object. 當您呼叫它的公用方法時，會建立物件。The object is created when you call its public methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用各種方法和屬性類別。The following code example shows how to use various methods and properties of the class. 此範例會呼叫連接到系統的屬性，以擷取所有畫面的陣列。The example calls the property to retrieve an array of all the screens connected to the system. 傳回每個，範例會將裝置名稱、 範圍、 類型、 工作區域中，主要畫面。For each returned , the example adds the device name, bounds, type, working area, and primary screen to a . 若要使用的範例，請新增並至表單，然後新增按鈕的事件處理常式。To use the example, add a and a to a form, and then add a event handler for the button. [!code-cpp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得記憶體的位元數 (與資料的單一像素有關)。

span.span: Gets the number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data.

value.span: 記憶體的位元數 (與資料的單一像素有關)。

span.span: The number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，每個螢幕的像素的位元數時，使用點陣圖。Typically, the number of bits per pixel for a screen is useful when working with bitmaps. 如需有關點陣圖的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。For more information about bitmaps, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於單一顯示畫面的系統中，主顯示器會是唯一的顯示。For a single display system, the primary display is the only display. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of property and the method. 此方法需要包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。This method requires a form containing a button named `Button1`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkingArea As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle WorkingArea { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示的工作區域。

span.span: Gets the working area of the display.

summary.span: 工作區域是指顯示的桌面區域，不包括工具列、停駐視窗和停駐工具列。

span.span: The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
A , representing the working area of the display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作區域是指顯示的桌面區域，不包括工具列、停駐視窗和停駐工具列。The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars. 如果 Windows 工作列設定為 自動隱藏，不論是否在工作列目前顯示時，就會傳回整個螢幕區域。 will return the entire area of the screen if the Windows Taskbar is set to Auto-Hide, no matter whether the Taskbar is currently displayed or not.
